SELECT u.user_NO, u.user_ID, u.user_name, CONCAT(u.user_phone1, '-', u.user_phone2, '-', u.user_phone3) AS user_phone, CONCAT(u.user_email1, '@', u.user_email2) AS user_email, cd.common_value FROM user u LEFT OUTER JOIN common cd ON u.common_CODE = cd.common_CODE WHERE u.common_CODE != 'ADM002' AND u.user_NO != 1
LIMIT ${cpp} OFFSET ${skip}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user u LEFT OUTER JOIN common c ON c.common_CODE = u.common_CODE WHERE c.common_CODE != 'ADM002' AND u.user_NO != 1

SELECT c.company_NO, c.company_ID, c.company_name, CONCAT(c.company_phone1, '-', c.company_phone2, '-', c.company_phone3) AS company_phone, CONCAT(c.company_email1, '@', c.company_email2) AS company_email, cd.common_value FROM company c LEFT OUTER JOIN common cd ON c.common_CODE = cd.common_CODE WHERE c.common_CODE = 'CRG002' AND c.common_CODE != 'ADM003' AND c.company_NO != 1
LIMIT ${cpp} OFFSET ${skip}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM company c LEFT OUTER JOIN common cd ON c.common_CODE = cd.common_CODE WHERE c.common_CODE = 'CRG002' AND c.common_CODE != 'ADM003' AND c.company_NO != 1

SELECT u.user_NO, u.user_ID, u.user_name, CONCAT(u.user_email1, '@', u.user_email2) AS user_email, CONCAT(u.user_phone1, '-', u.user_phone2, '-', u.user_phone3) AS user_phone, u.user_intro, rm.resume_realname FROM user u LEFT OUTER JOIN resume rm ON u.user_NO = rm.user_NO WHERE u.user_NO=#{userNO}

SELECT c.company_NO, c.company_ID, c.company_name, CONCAT(c.company_email1, '@', c.company_email2) AS company_email, CONCAT(c.company_phone1, '-', c.company_phone2, '-', c.company_phone3) AS company_phone, c.company_intro, ci.company_intro_realname FROM company c LEFT OUTER JOIN company_intro ci ON c.company_NO = ci.company_NO WHERE c.company_NO=#{companyNO}
